website_summaries.verdict: If you want to save some money, this is the machine to get. It has ample features and impressive speed settings considering the low-end price.
pros: Users rave about the features and price
capacity, and remote control operation in a portable, 35-lb
cons: Some users complain that it's noisy, while others report a knocking sound that intensifies with use

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for PTSD
customer_reviews.text: Google the works of Dr. David Berceli & Tension & Trauma Releasing Exercises. TRE®. As a US Marine veteran that has been honorably discharge close to 2 decades ago; I am finally getting treatment for PTSD. Whole body vibration modulates my tremors & occurences of anxiety attacks. It is like a massage to your autonomic nervous system. I recommend this type of therapy for military, law enforcement, fire fighters, or survivors of child abuse / sexual assaults as an adjunct for releasing stored emotional trauma
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Fun work out
customer_reviews.text: Fun work out. I am 60ish, with an active lifestyle. Walk a 60 pound dog a couple of times a day, but still can't get stubborn mid section spread to behave. I have used this almost a week, and already feel better for it. And... wow...! You really can get a good workout at 80, which is not even full power. I used it standing, squats, and then for planks and leaning into my elbows or palms. about 30 minutes a day. Love the remote control and minimal foot print. And if you are looking for something to just get tension out at the end of the day, 5 minutes on this and your achy back will feel better
customer_reviews.author: YInman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive results in just 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this every day since it came in. I LOVE it. my spine issues have been amazingly alleviated, i rarely take meds for the back/shoulder/neck pain now. my balance is noticeably better, and my clothes are starting to loosen up. Its been just over 2 weeks! I started feeling the extra energy from the first usage. I get on mine before I even have a first cup of coffee after waking and usually again later in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Phenix

customer_reviews.title: Fibromyalgia fix!
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia. This machine has made my everyday pain diminish greatly. I stand on it for 10 minutes 3 times a day and I have noticed a lot less aches and tightness across my chest and hips. As a strange bonus I have begun losing weight. I have not increased my exercise regime aside from this and I have not changed my diet. Honestly, I do not understand it but I don't think I need to. It's simply shakes the stress away and it possibly shakes the weight away.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: I use this 5-6 days a week.
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. I did a little bit of research before purchasing. This isn’t great for everyone but I personally love it. It helps relax my muscles during my home workouts so I’m not sore after. Once I got familiar with the various speed settings, I incorporated squat and arm exercises on this machine. I feel you get almost 2x the workout while on the vibration machine because you’re whole body is moving. I added Hiit cardio into My routine and then hop on the machine to do light weights, and I’m usually drenched and burned 200 calories in 20 min. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy using
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea what to expect as I had never used this type of equipment. Very pleasantly surprised. It is very sturdy and quiet. I agree with other reviewers that the directions are pretty bad, but I found a few online videos that do the job. I had an issue with the resistance bands that was rectified immediately by the seller. Much appreciated. I found this to be a pretty good workout! I thought my legs and core were already strong, but I can definitely feel this. I am starting out kind of slow and working up to a higher intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Pinty Full Body Exercise Vibration Platform
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stand on it because of having a new hip but where I have lymphedema I sit in a chair and put my feet on it. It does help to move the fluid. I am 64 and tried the exercises where you have your hands on it. It made me feel like anything inside of my head was getting shaken up so won't do those anymore. IF anyone buys this and can stand on it, it's a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhetta

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vibration platform and I use it consistently after my workouts to assist with muscle recovery, muscle conditioning, and to break up cellulite in my thighs and buttocks. I definitely notice a difference. Just started doing push up and upper body workouts. We will see how effective it is with my arms and mid section.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I have a small house and like to keep it clutter free
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as $2500.00 unit my mom purchased from Costco. I have a small house and like to keep it clutter free. This unit is perfect because it can be stored under my couch. It is very quiet and powerful. Amazing price for quality unit!
customer_reviews.author: rawracing

customer_reviews.title: Not too high.
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at how quiet this is. Has it helped me lose weight? I don't know. I can't turn it up too high without getting a little disoriented.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: A friend has one of these and told me it ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend has one of these and told me it would help with my back. I was skeptical but decided to give it a try. She was right, it really helped with my back pain. I have been using the platform for 5 days and have seen a noticeable improvement. Hopefully the easing of my pain will continue as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I started off with 5 minutes and it seemed very easy until I woke up the next day and really ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong even on the lowest setting. I started off with 5 minutes and it seemed very easy until I woke up the next day and really felt how hard my muscles worked. Excited to incorporate this into my exercise routine. Very sturdy and like that I can hide it easier than the ones with handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Better then I expected. I love using it and I have definitely notice improved muscle strength and a tighter booty. No more swollen ankles using this after hours sitting at computer. I use it daily and love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Doctor reciommeded I get vibration plate.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vibration plate! My doctor recommended it 9 mo ago for increasing lymphatic flow, but I was procrastinating. Wow! It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: tish

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I like to do this before bed for 5-15 minutes on the lowest setting. It is relaxing like a massage. I have also lost 3 pounds since I started using it a month ago though I'm not sure if this is the cause.
customer_reviews.author: Am. Custom.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and it gives you a great workout. Please make sure you can use this ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it gives you a great workout. Please make sure you can use this as it really jiggles you pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Silverayne

customer_reviews.title: Fair & a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are hard to read. Batteries fall out of the remote constantly, had to put a rubber band on it. The resistance bands are for a child or very short person, they are only 22 inches long, totally useless. I have tried to purchase longer ones but have not received a response from the seller or any other vendor. However, with the limitations listed above, It has help with some of my issues and I look forward to using it once or twice a day because my body feels good afterwards. I just wish I could use bands and understand how it all works better.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as I hoped it would. It has several pre-programed settings. The only thing is that you don't know what the setting/speeds are for the pre-programed settings - the booklet doesn't tell you. You have to find out by actually running the machine for each program. Additionally there are only 8 exercises shown. I would urge the manufactures to seriously enhance the booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back and hip pain, and after using one of these at my chiropractor's office, I knew I had to have one for my home. This product greatly loosens up my hips and relieves pain in my hips and back. I don't know about the slimming effects since I am within weight, but that would be a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: NHB

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: It works ! I felt amazing after the very first use. The vibration helps with my circulation and my muscles feel more relaxed. Within 15 days I started to see my belly and hips tightening and more slim. I also did diet and some light exercise. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 1.5 years ago and broke already.  Has not been used a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product, but due to situations, I didn't use it a lot. The exercise bands, didn't want to stay on, but that was okay. They would just flip up at me. A bit annoying. I got ready to get back to using it or really start using it and it won't stay running. I guess it is the motor. Once in a while it would start up on it's own. It is a very expensive floor decoration now. It has never been abused. I have no young children in my house. It has always been plugged into a surge protector.
customer_reviews.author: Trying to improve

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Totally enjoying it. Worth the price. I wanted to try one of these for awhile now but didn't want to spend $250 on it. I even use when I'm stressed, it helps to relax me.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: a great machine
customer_reviews.text: After getting this slimming machine, I used it for 20 minutes every day. After running for an hour every day, I relaxed for 20 minutes. This machine can set the time, the speed of shaking, and two elastic bands, which can exercise the arm. Muscle, feeling very good, the muscles of the body will shake, from the birth of the child, the body is a loose meat, not strong, for a few days, there is no obvious effect, I hope to stick to it will have different effects I look forward to how slim I am.
customer_reviews.author: aiden

customer_reviews.title: Lowest setting is WAY TOO powerful and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Lowest setting is WAY TOO powerful and fast. Lowest setting needs to be more gentle so I could work up to a faster speed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Know Until Replaced If Worth My Time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the entire left side smashed inward. Interesting that the shipping box did not appear to be damaged. Hmmm... This device was highly recommended by a massage therapist.
customer_reviews.author: CDRLARSON

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to lose weight and promote full body circulation
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now, can't say it helped me lose Allot of weight, only dropped a few pounds but it's helped with circulation and muscle tone.
customer_reviews.author: Czarinatecklah

customer_reviews.title: I tend to just feel happy after using this machine
customer_reviews.text: I track my sleep and since I have been using this, my sleep score has nearly doubled to reflect improved sleep quality. I do this in the morning for 10 minutes before work. Also, for no real reason, I tend to just feel happy after using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Helps me to exercise every morning for only 15 minutes/day
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought it I work out on it about 10-15 mins per day and I do feel better and more flexible with my body. I work long hours and I don't have the time nor the mood to waste even 1 hour in the gym. This platform helps me work out in the mornings before going to work and it gives me a boost of energy for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenates my body  and clears my mind
customer_reviews.text: So happy it arrived last week and works as described. But picture on Amazon made me think it was tiny, like 12 inches wide. The reviews mentioned doing squats and other exercises while on the vibration board. I could not imagine doing that safely until i received a huge box. I love using it daily..mornng noon and night. Glad i got the protection plan. This vibration board is definitely a keeper👍
customer_reviews.author: Etna

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase on workout equipment I ever made
customer_reviews.text: I have challenged knees and due to the "Virus" I am unable to go to therapy. I use this most days and it has kept my legs from immobility. Just ten minutes a day and unlike walking, it doesn't hurt my knees. I have Rheumatoid Arthritis. It has also firmed my thighs. All you gotta do is stand people. Get it now. You'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Makanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore feet!
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem the first time using the machine, it was very loud. Glad I gave it another chance the next day because the noise was gone and works smoothly and quietly as I had expected. Glad I bought it! Was on my feet for 8 hours and they hurt badly. Used the machine for 10 minutes and the pain was gone! Have continued to use it regularly and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: So to be fair this product gets used excessively. I use it as a motivator for autistic kids I work with. I've had it a couple months now and it has gotten much louder. It does its just though, as far as motivating my kiddos. I don't use it for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price range.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday and I’ve only used it 2 days in 3x 10 min sessions and you can definantly feel it working after about 10 min into program. It’s too early to tell if it’s made any difference as far as muscle tone or weight loss so I’ll find out in time. Only part that is discouraging is there is no Manuel to tell you of all it’s functions and what routines to do to work certain areas of your body. So you gotta find other platforms instructions and go with their exercise routines.
customer_reviews.author: omisso

customer_reviews.title: If you Know How yo work it? It’s totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery came on time! Love the product. I totally see a difference I’m my lower body and midsections. Much faster than just s regular workout, especially since I can’t get to a treadmill or gym like I’m used to. I highly recommend for in home workout especially if you like yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The item worked but makes too much noise louder than normal noise
customer_reviews.text: The item worked but makes too much noise louder than normal noise wanted to return it but did not get time to do that. I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a message to seller & got no response. I feel the instructions are poor. Don't know what exercises to do, how often or how long. Having trouble turning it on. Will return if I don't get a response.
customer_reviews.author: jules51

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: This machine has helped me get toned up! A car accident with concussion and physical therapy and a lot of pain made it impossible to lift weights and do walks. I love this machine! Grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 months. No longer works. Too late to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett S Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: It's kinda heavy too move around. It comes with a little exercise booklet.
customer_reviews.text: This machine really gets the body circulation going, just after 10 minutes on it. I feel highly energized, the heaviness in my legs in the morning disappears after being on this machine for a few minutes, I'm able to walk a lot better and for a longer period of time. I haven't lost any weight yet because I haven't been trying or consistent in doing that, but overall a great machine and glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phaze67

customer_reviews.title: Best $124 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I broke my back in the military and have severe neck pain as well. I see a chiropractor, take pain pills, do acupuncture, go to pain management for treatments.......but, this is the best thing I've tried. I saw the big ones with handles at Sam's for thousands of dollars and I did question how good this little one for $124 could be.......no questions. It is amazing! I just got it delivered today and I didn't want to get off it to type this :) It has already helped my neck pain in one use. Thank you for such a great piece at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this machine for indoor excise. The sounds are quieter than we thought so we do not bother to excise using this machine while watching TV. It is very helpful during “stay-home” order since all GYM were closed. Also, the customer service is very supportive if you have any issues or questions.
customer_reviews.author: K Imai

customer_reviews.title: Check size and weight before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: The machine was not suitable for me, it was very heavy and only suitable for a gym setting I had to return it..
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Can’t use it at all. And such a hassle to return because it’s so heavy! I am so upset about this purchase. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that it's cured anything, but I totally enjoy the whole body massage I get from it! I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I don’t was broken when it arrived not happy at all broken
customer_reviews.text: I don’t was broken when it arrived not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: T. Triol

customer_reviews.title: Resistance band clip broken
customer_reviews.text: It came with two resistance bands and one was broken before I even used it they have little clips you clip onto the unit so I am unable to use bands. It feels great to stand on the machine to release and massage the body.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this a few days ago and it has already helped with the pain in my hip. It's easy to do 10-15 minutes per day. I really see health benefits in my digestion as well. The downside is that the manual is impossible to decipher. I wish there was a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Loved the machine until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved the machine until it stopped working.. it worked for about a week and then one morning it wouldn't turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Sonali

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help back pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for my chronic lower back pain. It definitely distracts the pain....but hasn’t eliminated it completely when not on machine. I will continue to use it.....only been a week. It certainly doesn’t hurt. I have noticed better balance.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: I literally hide it between the furniture so I can watch tv and use it at the same time. Though it be but little it is fierce. It literally shakes all my sinuses and alleviates the pressure. Plus, it feels like I biked a couple of miles once I step off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci Rees

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, it helps a lot with you flexibility, I feel it has improved my health
customer_reviews.author: zaida guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great company to buy from
customer_reviews.text: My remote wasn't responding and the company was VERY prompt to send another one with no questions asked. I love this platform. Probably not good for those with balance issues but for everyone else I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. I own one and use it, then a friend used mine and loved it. I purchased one for her for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: this machine is very loud...and my organs HURT (kidneys, liver stomach) after first day of using...but my body got used to motion...it did relieve my stress points...SLEPT very well after using even after the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take a caution
customer_reviews.text: Definitely use sneakers while on this product and remember to bend the knee otherwise you’ll be hurt I learned the hard way
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIA

customer_reviews.title: Good Vibrations
customer_reviews.text: I liked the vibration for my balance. Due to the severe nuerapathy in my leg, I had to stop using it because of the pain. If you only have a balance problem, it is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was pretty amazing, but the wanted $900 for it
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product at the State Fair of Oklahoma. I thought it was pretty amazing, but the wanted $900 for it. Being the Amazon Queen that I am, I knew I could get the SAME THING on Amazon for a fraction of the price. I'm still waiting to see if it actually helps me lose weight, but I definitely feel the burn when I get off after 10 minutes. I also then kneel down and put my hands on it to massage my shoulders and back. You can move your body around to target different areas. I'm saving a lot of money on massage therapy! Works great! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: crowebird1

customer_reviews.title: needs to be on solid ground
customer_reviews.text: Works great. can put you off balance a little on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ennis

customer_reviews.title: OMG I LOVE LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE LOVE this!!!!!!!!!!!! I used one for a while at my,spa and decided to get my own!!!!!! It DEFINITELY does what it says!!! I love it being so,mobile so,I can use it where ever I want. I use this and do cardio for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: dAVI DYE

customer_reviews.title: Great for Circulation
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vibration platform specifically to improve circulation in my quadriceps muscles. It seems to work. I am increasing my run time and the stimulation increases accordingly - a strong tingling and itching sensation. The instructions are not inordinately clear, but the machine is pretty easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived safely
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days so cannot answer for effectiveness but it is easy to use & substancial so fingers crossed that it will help rehab muscl s weakened by injury.
customer_reviews.author: StyleChampion

customer_reviews.title: Hold on to something for stabilization the first time you use it
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this machine. Service was fast and the machine works easily making me able to do therapy at home instead of going to my chiropractor, thank you very much ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Anna Haese

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase this brand
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I pressed on the remote it did the program and speed it wanted and since it was too extreme it caused more pain physically than whatever benefits were offered
customer_reviews.author: sr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an office workout
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my home office - I can work on my computer and exercise at the same time. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Dog Fan

customer_reviews.title: Restless Leg Syndrome
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with RLS and so far it’s doing great. I hope that it continues to work well!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work
customer_reviews.text: I put batteries in the remote but it does not work
customer_reviews.author: Pam Gary

customer_reviews.title: Unit Works Well. Customer Service Doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: This unit came with a defective remote. Never worked. I reached out to sender via some automated process. Never heard back. The unit itself works well. I could still access functions. A working remote would have been nice. *I purchased this months ago **still works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: GeeNius

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE PERFORMS AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times just received. Machine seems well made and I feel like I've worked out. Sore muscles to prove it 💪
customer_reviews.author: Glenn I. Smith

customer_reviews.title: You have to figure out how to use yourself, but worth the time & money invested
customer_reviews.text: After an initial problem getting the platform to start, I finally figured it out! Very effective. Thorough workout in 15 minutes. Great for relieving aches and pains and improving lymphatic drainage.
customer_reviews.author: AEP-USA

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and exactly what the doctor prescribed. I use this daily. It is such a sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Started making a loud "knocking" noise on one side after a few weeks of use. I can still use it, but the noise is distracting and annoying so it's not the relaxing experience it was. Does help my leg muscles loosen up after a run or before bed when they tend to get a little achy. It would be 5 stars for me if not for the terrible knocking noise.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Stimulates your whole body at once!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great way to power exercise. Just set the timer and go. Never used it for pain relief so can't rate that category.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Plug
customer_reviews.text: Ummm I don’t understand there is a plug for 220v this is made for European plugs? How are you using this product?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Circulation is so much better and I have more stamina!
customer_reviews.author: Joye

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just love it!!!!!!! It's the best choice that I have ever made in a purchase..If you want stamina, strength & be rejuvenated please buy one of these. My grandson loves it too. My daughter calls it the shaker machine she enjoys it as well...Consider a purchase
customer_reviews.author: cindiancerokee

customer_reviews.title: Jiggly board
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s sturdy and does just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Adams

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy and you don’t get winded after using it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my pinty it’s great for toning,I got it to get rid of adhesions caused by a previous stomach surgery.I seems like it’s helping,Ive only been using it a couple of weeks, I do use it 30minutes a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take up much room.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product ahead of time which was a nice surprise. So far, I’m loving using this. The best part is that it doesn’t take up too much space like the bigger apparatus I was thinking of getting. With all the speed settings I’m sure this does as good of a job as a whole contraption. It’s just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: I love the vibe plate it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibe plate it's perfect. But it smells like gasoline and is stinking up the whole house. I might not be able to keep if the smell doesn't wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Use 10 minutes every a.m., i think it will help to improve my balance.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. Now I can exercise again. Its a motivator and at the same time I watch my shows or news Win win for me. Drink my first cup a coffee on it. Its a challenge not to spell it. Its inexpensive and does wonders for your overall body activity. It helps with nerve pain and circulation .Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Inge M. Prince

customer_reviews.title: it was a gift!!
customer_reviews.text: awsome n good shippimg and on time. it was meant as a gift n we checked it n omg awsome thank u so much. i recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: razsel288

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Should have an actual remote. The so called “remote” is a key pad on the device. So your bending down trying to stop or change settings while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at how well made and sturdy it is
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well made and sturdy it is. So far I’m noticing relief in my knees by using it 2 x a day at medium speed. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: Just Stopped Working after 2 Months!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked! I just purchased it on Aug.7th 2018, kept in the same spot, powered off when not in use. AND it just stopped working (plate doesn't move).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this platform. It is easy to use and it really helps me with my back pain. My remote control wasn't working but I contacted the seller and they made sure that I got new one quickly. I recommend this product not only for the quality but their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Machine....
customer_reviews.text: So far, no complaints. Am a satisfied customer, and will say that the machine is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Todo

customer_reviews.title: Missing instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vibration platform but lost the instructions booklet. Can I get another instruction manual from Amazon ? Or from the manufacturer?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can’t just stand on it to lose weight you gotta work out while on it
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it loses power after using it a few times but not so much so it doesn’t really affect it
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for rush lazy exercise ,most that im very busy and worked alot i really have no time to run 🏃‍♀️ at the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised as a crazy fit vibration plate platform when I arrived is a no-name knockoff from Alibaba in China! I would recommend do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Missing remote
customer_reviews.text: Missing the remote control machine works fine from the buttons on top but no info on where to get replacement remote
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast service!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and have enjoyed it for a couple of days. After better understanding of machine it might qualify for a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the price is the best by far
customer_reviews.text: excellently made for a light person, does everything I need and expect. certainly a best buy for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Value.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is pretty good. Its definitely quiet. Just haven't figured out how to use the walking, jogging, and running buttons on the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tanecia

customer_reviews.title: good vibrations
customer_reviews.text: product arrived in excellent condition, and seems to be working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Neckbone71

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this item. I feel overall better health wise/
customer_reviews.author: Babsdp

customer_reviews.title: The BEST EXERCISE MACHINE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this- I use this every day and I can't believe how fast it builds muscle and it's fun and i can watch a movie or the news while I'm using it! FABULOUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Allan

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received didn't work which was frustrating, but their customer service was so good that I am now very happy with my second one. I appreciate their support.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I love it but the problem I have with it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the problem I have with it is that the exercise straps don't really work well with the platform. They are place in a way that it is difficult to use them and resulted in scraping of all the paint on my vibration plate. There aren't very clear instructions that come with it either.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymouslyMe

product_meta.title: Pinty Fitness Vibration Platform - Whole Body Vibration Machine Crazy Fit Vibration Plate with Remote Control and Resistance Bands
feature_bullets: ABS shell for durability and sturdiness, ergonomic design, anti-static and anti-overload device, load capacity up to 265 lbs., LED display to show time, speed and fat at the same time

Adjustable vibration speed (1 to 99, with 99 having the maximum intensity) to suit different needs, remote easily controls the speed at the click of a button, and 10 minutes on this vibration platform equals 1 hour of jogging
Sleek design and ultra-thin (5.5 in.) blends well into any décor, non-skid feet for extra stability and security during operation, comes with wheels for easy transport and storage

Quiet operation, will not disturb you from watching TV shows, and comes with two detachable resistance bands to work out your arms and upper body; a manual to guide you through the appropriate process to achieve the ultimate results
Increases balance & coordination, promotes blood circulation, increases muscle tone, improves your body flexibility, and relieves backache by decompressing the spine, multiple colors to choose from
